value.title: Create Slope Chart (KPI) using Charticulator and using in Power BI
value.excerpt: This another my investigation on creating a custom visual using Charticulator. I created a Slope Chart that can be used as a KPI visual to measure the trend of a specific group in two different scales. value.title: PowerBI.tips - Tutorial - Monkey Tool Introduction - Part 1
